languages.text: {n}Равор недоуменно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Вы спросили тоже... вы мне нравитесь. А до вас — Леди Теодора. Ну и вообще, где бы я был, если бы мозгов хватало на Вольного Торговца залупаться? Хех, я жить хочу".

{n}Ravor looks perplexed.{/n} "What kind of a question is that? I like you. And Lady Theodora before you. Where would I be if I was making cracks about the Rogue Trader? Hah, I don't want to die just yet."
languages.original_text: {n}Равор недоуменно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Вы спросили тоже... вы мне нравитесь. А до вас — Леди Теодора. Ну и вообще, где бы я был, если бы мозгов хватало на Вольного Торговца залупаться? Хех, я жить хочу".

{n}Ravor looks perplexed.{/n} "What kind of a question is that? I like you. And Lady Theodora before you. Where would I be if I was making cracks about the Rogue Trader? Hah, I don't want to die just yet."

languages.text: {n}雷沃看起来很困惑。{/n}“这算是哪门子的问题？我喜欢你，也喜欢你的前任西奥多拉夫人。如果我敢对行商浪人说难听的，我会被扔到什么地方去？哈，我可不想作死。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks perplexed.{/n} "What kind of a question is that? I like you. And Lady Theodora before you. Where would I be if I was making cracks about the Rogue Trader? Hah, I don't want to die just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃看起来很困惑。{/n}“这算是哪门子的问题？我喜欢你，也喜欢你的前任西奥多拉夫人。如果我敢对行商浪人说难听的，我会被扔到什么地方去？哈，我可不想作死。”

languages.text: {n}Ravor parce perplejo.{/n} «¿Qué clase de pregunta es esa? Me cae bien usted. Y antes de usted, lady Theodora. ¿Dónde acabaría si me burlara de mi Comerciante Independiente? Ja, preferiría no morir todavía».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks perplexed.{/n} "What kind of a question is that? I like you. And Lady Theodora before you. Where would I be if I was making cracks about the Rogue Trader? Hah, I don't want to die just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor parce perplejo.{/n} «¿Qué clase de pregunta es esa? Me cae bien usted. Y antes de usted, lady Theodora. ¿Dónde acabaría si me burlara de mi Comerciante Independiente? Ja, preferiría no morir todavía».

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは困惑の表情を浮かべた。{/n}「どういうことですかい？私はあなたのことを好ましいと思っております。前は、シオドーラ様も。自由開拓者についてとやかく言えば、どうなるかわかったもんじゃない。ハハ、まだ死にたくありませんのでね」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks perplexed.{/n} "What kind of a question is that? I like you. And Lady Theodora before you. Where would I be if I was making cracks about the Rogue Trader? Hah, I don't want to die just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアは困惑の表情を浮かべた。{/n}「どういうことですかい？私はあなたのことが好ましいと思っております。その前は、テオドラ様も。ローグトレーダーについてとやかく言えば、どうなるかわかったもんじゃない。ハハ、まだ死にたくありませんのでね」

languages.text: {n}Ravor wirkt überrascht.{/n} "Was ist das denn für eine Frage? Ich mag Euch. Und Lady Theodora mochte ich auch. Stellt Euch vor, ich würde {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht mögen. Ha, ich will noch nicht sterben."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks perplexed.{/n} "What kind of a question is that? I like you. And Lady Theodora before you. Where would I be if I was making cracks about the Rogue Trader? Hah, I don't want to die just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor wirkt überrascht.{/n} "Was ist das denn für eine Frage? Ich mag Euch. Und Lady Theodora mochte ich auch. Stellt Euch vor, ich würde {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht mögen. Ha, ich will noch nicht sterben."

languages.text: {n}Ravor semble perplexe.{/n} « Quelle étrange question. Je vous apprécie, tout comme j'appréciais dame Théodora avant vous. Mais j'oserais jamais me moquer {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Ha ha, je tiens trop à la vie pour m'y risquer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks perplexed.{/n} "What kind of a question is that? I like you. And Lady Theodora before you. Where would I be if I was making cracks about the Rogue Trader? Hah, I don't want to die just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor semble perplexe.{/n} « Quelle étrange question. Je vous apprécie, tout comme j'appréciais dame Théodora avant vous. Mais j'oserais jamais me moquer {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Ha ha, je tiens trop à la vie pour m'y risquer. »

languages.text: {n}Ravor, şaşkına dönmüş gibi duruyor.{/n} "O nasıl soru? Sizi seviyorum tabii ki. Sizden önce de Leydi Theodora'yı severdim. Hem Hür Tacir hakkında atıp tutsam burada olur muydum? Daha ecelime susamadım."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor looks perplexed.{/n} "What kind of a question is that? I like you. And Lady Theodora before you. Where would I be if I was making cracks about the Rogue Trader? Hah, I don't want to die just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor, şaşkına dönmüş gibi duruyor.{/n} "O nasıl soru? Sizi seviyorum tabii ki. Sizden önce de Leydi Theodora'yı severdim. Hem Hür Tacir hakkında atıp tutsam burada olur muydum? Daha ecelime susamadım."
